title: Expanding Card
subtitle: Expand card on click
description: Expanding Card using HTML, CSS and JavaScript. You can create card expand animation very easily if you know basic HTML and CSS.

title: Modal View
subtitle: create a modal window which is used on websites to get users to do or see something specific
description: A good example of a modal window would be if a user made changes in a site without saving them and tried to go to another page. You can create a modal window that warns them to save their changes or else that information will be lost.

title: restaurant menu page
subtitle: restaurant menu page that filters through the different food menus
description: This is a fun project that will teach you higher order functions like map, reduce, and filter

title: navigation bar on scroll
subtitle: navigation bar on scroll
description: navbar that slides down when scrolling and then stays at a fixed position at a certain height.

title: countdown clock
subtitle: countdown clock
description: countdown clock which can be used when a new product is coming out or a sale is about to end on an ecommerce site.
